Description of incident: "On June 28, 2016, a TFS associate mistakenly emailed a spreadsheet containing customer information to her personal email account. The email was sent using an encrypted transmission method. This incident was discovered on June 28, 2016."The information compromised included account numbers, first and last names, telephone numbers, payoff amounts and maturity dates.More Information: http://oag.ca.gov/ecrime/databreach/reports/sb24-63586
